topics.body: Okay, so right now I'm on the cusp of buying a 3DS, and a game to go with it. The only thing is, I'm hung up on what game I should get, since I only have enough money to buy one. My choices are Super Smash Bros., Fire Emblem Awakening, and Bravely Default. And I want you guys to help me decide.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3
